charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to custody of BOP for 30 months on Ct 1 followed by 3 yr period of supervised release; Spec Cond of Super Rel: At discretion of USPO, dft may be required to part in sub abuse counsel, test and/or treat prog; dft may also be required to part in mental health counsel prog; Court recommends dft be placed in facility where he can obtain 500 hr intensive sub abuse treat; no fine; $100 MPA; $147,693.70 restitution to Soc Security Admin-Region VII, dft to make nominal and periodic payments on restitution; restitution is joint and several with Case No. 98-00165-01-CR-W-3, Kathleen Ann Diagre (1)
